pricing.load_error: Unable to load pricing information. Please try again later.

free.desc: Perfect for small preschools getting started

pricing.subtitle_marketing: Flexible pricing for schools of all sizes. Start free and scale as you grow.
pricing.subtitle_app: Flexible options for individuals, preschools and schools. AI usage includes monthly quotas. Overages require prepayment.
pricing.free_ribbon: You are on the Free plan
pricing.restricted_principal_only: Only principals or school admins can request Preschool Pro.
pricing.restricted_enterprise_only: Only principals or school admins can request Enterprise.
pricing.restricted_submit_only: Only principals or school admins can submit these requests.
pricing.enterprise_subtitle: Our enterprise solutions are designed for large school districts, government education departments, and multi-national education providers.

notes.title: Notes
notes.quota: AI quotas are monthly and reset at the start of each month.
notes.overages: Overages require prepayment; once paid, access resumes immediately.
notes.model_selection: Model selection affects cost; Opus > Sonnet > Haiku. We recommend Haiku for most classroom use.
notes.enterprise_contact: For K-12 Enterprise pricing, contact sales. We tailor seat counts and AI usage pools to your school size and needs.

faq.q1: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan anytime?
faq.a1: Yes! You can change your plan at any time. Upgrades take effect immediately, and downgrades take effect at the start of your next billing cycle.
faq.a2: No setup fees for Starter and Professional plans. Enterprise plans may include implementation services.
faq.q3: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a3: We accept all major credit cards, PayFast, and bank transfers for South African customers.
